isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR CHECK LINK

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Check Link on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 51 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the front cab door check link (Item 2) inside the front cab door (Item 3) with threaded studs sticking through mounting holes in front cab door. Install two hex nuts (Item 1) onto threaded studs of front cab door check link, driver side shown. Tighten to 77 to 95 Lbf-in (8.7 to 10.7 N•m).

Install front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install front cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric windows and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Windows and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If front cab door is equipped with manual windows and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door check link.

svcsubproc.title: Install Crew Cab Rear Door Check Link on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 52 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the crew cab rear door check link (Item 2) inside the crew cab rear door (Item 3) with threaded studs sticking through mounting holes in crew cab rear door. Install two hex nuts (Item 1) onto threaded studs of crew cab rear door check link, driver side shown. Tighten to 77 to 95 Lbf-in (8.7 to 10.7 N•m).

Install rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install rear cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Windows and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side crew cab rear door check link.
